meta.description: A collection of my mods for the game Balatro.

ror.title: Risk of Jesters - DVRP's Balatro Mods
ror.description: Adds a bunch of Risk-of-Rain-themed Jokers, Vouchers, and Blinds.
ror.name: Risk of Jesters
ror.intro: New Jokers, Vouchers, and Blinds themed with the Risk of Rain franchise make their entrance, yet still retaining the feeling of vanilla Balatro. The volume is not that big yet, but you can expect more to come as new DLC for Risk of Rain 2 is approaching...
ror.install-2: Download the mod and unzip it.
ror.install-3: Put <xin><c>RiskofJesters</></> folder into <xin><c>C:\Users\(USER)\AppData\Roaming\Balatro\Mods</></>. Create the <xin><c>Mods</></> folder if it doesn't exist.

languages.description: Following languages are supported for now.

ror.contents: Current version has {jokers} Jokers, {vouchers} Vouchers, and {blinds} Blinds. You can check the full list below.

changelog.0-1-1: Now properly displays Steamodded mod badge, added Russian translation done by <xin><c>@ĞĞ•Ğ¨ĞšĞ</></>, fixed incorrect collection page ordering of some Jokers, and changed Eulogy Zero's ability to have 1 in 2 chance.

bungus.name: Bustling Fungus
bungus.description:
After 5 rounds, add Foil to base edition Jokers on both sides
(Currently 0/5)

snake_eyes.name: Snake Eyes
snake_eyes.description:
Gains +6 Mult if The Wheel of Fortune fails
(Currently +2 Mult)

daisy.name: Lepton Daisy
daisy.description: <chip>+50</> Chips for each <at>debuffed</> card in played hand

kjaro.name: Kjaro's Band
kjaro.description: <xmult>X4</> Mult if Chips scored in last round were more than <at>X4</> of required Chips

duplicator.name: Substandard Duplicator
duplicator.description:
When gain a Joker, create a Negative Temporary copy of it
Temporary : Gets destroyed at end of round and has no sell value

happiest.name: Happiest Mask
happiest.description:
1 in 2 chance to create a random Spectral card when any card is destroyed
(Must have room)

benthic.name: Benthic Bloom
benthic.description: Upgrade <at>1</> random <at>Joker</> into <at>Joker</> of the next <at>higher rarity</> when <at>Boss Blind</> is defeated

encrusted.name: Encrusted Key
encrusted.description: After defeating the <at>Boss Blind</>, this card is destroyed and gain a <at>Coupon Tag</>

egocentrism.name: Egocentrism
egocentrism.description:
+40 Chips for each Egocentrism. Convert a random Joker into Egocentrism when Blind is selected
(Currently +40 Chips)

eulogy.name: Eulogy Zero
eulogy.description: <at>Shop</> cards have <gr>1 in 2</> chance of being <at>half price</> and <at>flipped</>

mili.name: Mili-Tech Printer
mili.description: Can choose <at>1</> more card from all <at>Booster Packs</>

loop.name: The Loop
loop.description: Random Joker disabled after playing 2 hands

void.name: The Void
void.description: Set all Jokers' sell value to 0 when defeated

hammer.name: Glaucous Hammer
hammer.description: Start with random half of the deck debuffed

crab.name: Tyrian Crab
crab.description: X1.5 required Chips after each hand played
